title: Twitter can't help but notice how natural President DeSantis looks during Hurricane Ian visit with Joe Biden
description: I promised myself nothing partisan during the Joe Biden/Ron DeSantis visit today. Florida got wrecked by Hurricane Ian. It sends a good message to the country to see the two rivals working together and setting aside petty bullplop. title: Watch: Megyn Kelly TRASHES the Kardashians as a 'force for evil'
description:
Megyn Kelly is no fan of the Kardashians. On a recent episode of her podcast, she called the Kardashians a "force of evil" and lamented the vanity they are responsible for in our society.

Here's the quote that's making it's way around social media:

title: Watch: POTUS smirks at reporters while his handlers chase them out of the room, and THEN he gets insulting
description: Another day means another example of how afraid Joe Biden's handlers are of him answering questions. title: Liberal Meltdown: Elon Musk finalizes Twitter purchase (Show Notes)
description: It finally happened. Scooby Doo's Velma is now an official lesbian, as Hollywood continues to make sure there is a gay on TV at all times. We examine why that is. Also, it looks like Elon Musk is finalizing the Twitter deal for real this time. And who sabotaged the Nord Stream pipeline?

title: GOP Senator has three words of advice for anti-police Dems: 'Call a crackhead'

title: Top NFL receiver blasts New York's high taxes for sending him to Miami: 'I had to make the grown-up decision'
description: Super Bowl champion Tyreek Hill is the number three wide receiver in the NFL. At least, as far as fantasy football points go which are the only stats that matter.
